title: Vince Pileggi
text: Vince Pileggi is wastewater engineer, adjunct professor, data scientist and uses applied statistical analytical skills heavily in his work. He uses R, RStudio, Quarto and GitHub proficiently for advanced research and authorship of publications and reports. Vince enjoys early morning jogging and food.

title: About Me
text:
Collaborate on solving wastewater problems using statistics



Ph.D. in Wastewater engineering with thesis on anaerobic membrane bioreactor to treat municipal sludge. M.A.Sc in wasteater



Worked on wastewater epidemiology investigating COVID in wastewater. Design Guidelines for wastewater treatment. Statistical review and reporting results in reports and publications.
Thanks for checking out my web site!
